meta.description: Optimize the redistribution of medical supplies among clinics to meet their requirements at minimum transportation cost.

sets.name: CLINICS
sets.description: Set of clinics involved in the distribution.

params.name: initial_stock
params.description: Initial stock of supplies at each clinic.

params.name: required_stock
params.description: Required stock of supplies at each clinic.

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Cost of transporting supplies between clinics.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Amount of supplies transported from one clinic to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transport_cost[i][j] * flow[i][j] for i in CLINICS for j in CLINICS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total transportation cost of redistributing supplies.

constraints.name: clinic_1_balance
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['1'] + sum(flow[j]['1'] for j in CLINICS if j != '1') - sum(flow['1'][j] for j in CLINICS if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure Clinic 1 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: clinic_2_balance
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['2'] + sum(flow[j]['2'] for j in CLINICS if j != '2') - sum(flow['2'][j] for j in CLINICS if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure Clinic 2 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: clinic_3_balance
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['3'] + sum(flow[j]['3'] for j in CLINICS if j != '3') - sum(flow['3'][j] for j in CLINICS if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure Clinic 3 meets its required stock.

constraints.name: clinic_4_balance
constraints.expr_lhs: initial_stock['4'] + sum(flow[j]['4'] for j in CLINICS if j != '4') - sum(flow['4'][j] for j in CLINICS if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure Clinic 4 meets its required stock.
